section.title: Activities
section.para:
&THIS.RA; Resource Adaptor type defines two activities. Both are created and destroyed explicitly by SBB . Activity objects are:
javax.media.mscontrol.networkconnection.NetworkConnection
javax.media.mscontrol.mediagroup.MediaGroup
The NetworkConnection activity represents connection to peer over RTP . It is used to as handle to peer capabilities and data stream.
The MediaGroup activity represents set of connections, on which certain operations are performed. MediaGroup is used with NetworkConnection activity.
